thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 4 of 186
thread.title: Cami
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Cami

author: Cami
title: Cami
text: I ordered 2 Birthday cakes for a friends birthday in another state. They were very accommodating when I had to change the delivery a day earlier. The cakes arrived in perfect condition and I was told that they were incredible. I had not ever ordered Birthday cake delivery and was a bit hesitant. Well now I know I found the perfect place! Will not hesitate to order again!
